page.title: 05The Social Scene (continued)
page.content: {OTHER AMENITIES Apart from the previous main amenities here are some more small organisations in our area: {DOLPHINS This is a junior swimming club,and a lot of children in our area attend.It takes place at the Mary Webb School swimming pool,Pontesbury on Fridays. {DASH AND DAWDLE This is an event taking place on each Boxing Day, a 3-mile charity run for all-comers from the Stiperstones Inn to the Devil's Chair and back. {STIPERSTONES BRASS A brass band of some sort has existed for almost a century. Our present band started in 1972 and was known as the "Mary Webb County Brass Band".Recently it was changed to "Stiperstones Brass" to avoid confusion with the Mary Webb School Band.
